summary: The diff implements all four requirements with comprehensive backend and frontend changes. REQ-31 (utilization tracker with multi-tasking support) is implemented with backend data structures and frontend display logic allowing >100% utilization. REQ-32 (UI enhancements) is implemented across multiple components with improved styling, shadows, borders, and spacing. REQ-33 (manual time entry) is implemented with manual mode toggle and datetime-local inputs in both case tracking and batch entry. REQ-34 (case editing) is implemented with a new EditCaseModal component, backend editCase mutation, and edit buttons in the case list. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed based on the code evidence.
